effects.description: A collection of all effects in the game, defining their behaviors, parameters, and conditions.

additional_tooltips.description: Additional tooltips to display for this card effect.

anim_to_play.description: Animation to play when this effect is triggered.

applied_to_self_vfx.description: Reference to VFX to use when applying the card effect to self.

applied_vfx.description: Reference to VFX to use when applying the card effect.

copy_modifiers_from_source.description: Applies when the effect is one that adds a card, whether to copy modifiers from the source card when applying this effect.

disallow_status_effect_modifiers.description: Disables modification of status effect stacks (Disables modification from Dualism, CardTraits, Relics, etc.)

filter_based_on_main_sub_class.description: Whether to filter cards from card pool parameter based on the primary or allied clan.

hide_tooltip.description: Whether to hide this card effect's tooltips.

ignore_temporary_modifiers_from_source.description: Applies when the effect is one that adds a card, whether to ignore temporary modifiers (upgrades) from the source card when applying this effect.

name.description: The EffectStateName, this should be the name of a Class inheriting from CardEffectBase. This can be a class from the base game, a class from your Plugin, or an object with id and mod_reference to refer to a class in someone else's mod.

param_bool_2.description: Second boolean parameter for the effect.

param_card_filter.description: Reference to a CardUpgradeMaskData. Used in certain effects to filter out target cards.

param_card_filter_2.description: Reference to a CardUpgradeMaskData. A Secondary filter used in certain effects to filter out target cards (Currently only used by CardEffectDrawType).

param_card.description: Reference to a card for the effect.

param_card_pool.description: Reference to card pool for the effect.

param_character.description: Reference to character for the effect.

param_character_2.description: Reference to an additional character for the effect.

param_character_pool.description: List of references to characters for the effect.

param_int_2.description: Second integer parameter for the effect.

param_int_3.description: Third integer parameter for the effect.

param_max_int.description: Maximum integer value for the effect (Only applicable if use_int_range is true).

param_min_int.description: Minimum integer value for the effect (Only applicable if use_int_range is true).

param_status_effects.description: List of status effects to apply.

param_trigger.description: Trigger parameter for the effect. This is a reference to a defined Character Trigger.

param_upgrade.description: CardUpgrade parameter for the effect. This is a referece to a defined Card Upgrade.

should_cancel_subsequent_effects_if_test.description: Whether to cancel all subsequent effects if this effect fails. Example: "Making it Rain" cancels effects if you don't have the 5 gold during playing the effects.

should_fail_to_cast_if_test_fails.description: Whether to prevent playing the card (or trigger) entirely if this effects' TestEffect method fails. Example a card with the Sacrifice <subtype> will fail if the target isn't of proper subtype.

should_test.description: Whether this effect should be tested before applying.

show_pyre_notification.description: Whether to show a notification in the Pyre room.

status_effect_multiplier.description: Status effect multiplier parameter. Only applicable if use_status_effect_multipler is true and this effect is within a CharacterTrigger. The number of stacks of status effect given will be used to multiply the effects magnitude.

supress_pyre_room_focus.description: Whether to suppress Pyre room focus when applying this effect.

target_card_selection_mode.description: Used in CardEffectRecursion to choose how cards from target_mode are selected.

target_ignore_bosses.description: Whether to ignore boss characters when targeting.

target_mode.description: Mode for selecting targets. This property combined with target_team will get you the base characters targetted for the effect.

target_mode_health_filter.description: Filter for target health when selecting targets.

target_mode_status_effect_filter.description: List of status effects used to filter out targets gathered from target_mode by.

target_subtype.description: Subtype to target. Will filter out targets from target_mode without the subtype provided.

target_team.description: Team to target. "monsters" for friendly units or "heroes" for enemy units.

use_health_missing_multiplier.description: Whether to use missing health as a multiplier.

use_int_range.description: Whether to use an integer range for parameters. If set, then set param_min_int and param_max_int to specify the range.

use_magic_power_multiplier.description: Whether to use magic power as a multiplier.

use_status_effect_multiplier.description: Whether to use status effect count as a multiplier. If set, then set status_effect_multipler to the status effect to multiply.

items.description: An effect definition that specifies how a card or ability affects the game state.
